jump_scares.spoiler: The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
Radek is suddenly pulled inside the door of the shack by an unseen creature
From a distance, we see the crocodile attempt to break out of the shack making a loud noise in the process
Lena and Dr. Ventress hear a rustling noise nearby
Sheppard is suddenly snatched away by a bear
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
The dogs body opens up and blood sprays out
The boy grabs Paul’s hand and bites it
A truck suddenly drives by behind the boy
Bert accidentally discharges his rifle
A man appears in Bert’s line of fire
A man appears, accompanied by a loud sound cue
A bloodied man appears at the front door, pleading for help
Marcy screams as a hand touches her shoulder
The police officer suddenly turns around and points her gun
Marcy shoots at the dog
Karen, who is very sick, appears
A woman with a rifle appears
A man jumps out of the water
Jeff is shot in the head
The bear appears in the foreground in the heavily zoomed shot, with a dramatic music chord
The phone in the foreground rings loudly, and Sari jumps up on the bed, startled by it
A sudden cut to a bear’s paw reaching for the lunch, with a dramatic music chord
A bear quickly runs across the frame in the background, accompanied by a scare chord
Peter is suddenly grabbed from behind and pulled back with force
After a few seconds of drawn out tension, the bear finally lunges towards the park ranger in the foreground with a roar
Just when Sari finally decides to step out from behind the tree, the bear’s paw suddenly smashes into it
The bear’s paw breaks through the glass and grabs the teenager’s head
A bloodied hand suddenly smashes against the window in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
After a long buildup of tension, a broom falls across the doorframe in front of the medic, startling him
The bear barges through the door in front of the medic
A figure appears in a dark doorway
A hand starts moving from behind the shower curtain
Accompanied by a loud sound, the shot abruptly changes to show an old lady in a bathtub
A hand grabs Dan’s hand
Abra suddenly opens her pupil-less, all white eyes
The shot abruptly changes to show Abra sitting on the edge of her bed, her eyes all white
Accompanied by a loud sound, a light suddenly turns on in a dark corridor
The shot abruptly changes to an axe going through a door accompanied by screams and noise
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
A wolf suddenly appears in front of Dan

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning

jump_scares.spoiler: A rubber spider drops from the ceiling
Tommy turns around wearing one of his masks
Jason appears in the mirror
Eddie comes to breakfast wearing one of Tommy’s masks
A cat jumps toward the woman
A hand with a hatchet comes through the window
A corpse is thrown through the window
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
During a dream, Travis’s grandfather suddenly coughs up blood
There is a loud knock on the door during a tense scene
A bullet narrowly misses the car
One of the windows in Paul’s truck is blown out
As Travis approaches the door there is a loud noise from the other side

movies.title: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight

jump_scares.spoiler: A postman gets grabbed by his feet and pulled inside a hole
A fox runs across the screen (accompanied by a loud sound)
Sudden cut to a monster standing above a character (accompanied by a loud sound)
Sudden cut to a rotten body (accompanied by a loud sound)
A severed head gets thrown out of the hole
A boy looks at his friend and sees her gruesomely killed
A priest turns around and sees a monster standing right next to him
Little boys turn their heads and look at their mom (accompanied by a loud sound)
A girl suddenly runs into a window of a police car
A truck drives by startling Rachel after she says “everything is inside”
The injured man grabs Louis around the arm as he wheels him into theater
The lights flicker and the previously dead man is suddenly sitting up on the bed behind Louis
Louis sits in his car lost in thought  as he goes to drive off a truck suddenly races past in front of him
Victor’s hand suddenly reaches out to grab Louis around the ankle as he climbs the pile of branches
During a flashback, young Rachel is startled as her disfigured sister suddenly falls down the dumbwaiter shaft
Louis opens the closet revealing Church who screeches at him
Ellie is suddenly scratched by the cat as she tries to remove something from its fur
Church screeches at Louis from behind
After Louis walks through a door and finds himself back outside in the woods, a truck horn suddenly blares
Rachel has a hallucination where the medicine cabinet in the bathroom transforms into the dumbwaiter shaft which her sister once again falls through
After Louis finds the mask, Ellie appears behind him and says “Daddy”
Jud spots Church in the hallway and suddenly Ellie stabs him in the ankle
After waking from a nightmare Rachel looks up to find Gage safe. Suddenly Ellie leaps at her with a knife
A snowball hits the window
A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
While running on the road, Peter is suddenly shot in the leg
The title card appears abruptly on the screen accompanied by a scream. [Video]
The gas station attendant suddenly appears in front of Holden
Holden removes a painting from the wall to reveal a window with Dana standing behind it
The cellar door opens by itself
Jules is stabbed in the hand while having sex
An agitated Curt suddenly appears beside Marty
Something punches through the cabin wall
A zombie breaks through the window and grabs Marty
A zombie hand comes through the window in Dana’s room
Holden is stabbed in the back by a zombie
Holden is stabbed in the neck while driving
The father zombie bangs his chain down in front of Dana
Dana puts her face up to a window and a werewolf lunges at the glass from the other side. [Video]
A man bangs on the car window, startling Sara
During a dream, Sara unzips a tent to reveal a girl however the girl’s face suddenly turns demonic
Sara removes a sheet from a body and sees a decayed corpse
An elderly lady suddenly lunges at Sara
Something moves just outside the tent
Sara looks out of the tent and has a vision of an old lady running towards her
Sara turns around and sees a girl watching her
A skeletal figure appears behind Sara
A girl appears behind Sara calling her name
Sara looks through a reel of photos and a man’s face suddenly pops up in front of one of the images
An apparently dead man suddenly sits up and screams
Hands reach out of the ground to grab Sara
Michi looks into the forest and sees Sara’s spirit which rushes at him
Claire turns around and is startled by Adam
As Adam takes a photograph, a creature appears in the woods
Adam looks up and Colm is standing on the road
The car trunk suddenly slams down on Adam
A shadowy figure moves past a window
There is a high pitched squawk and Adam shoots his gun
Adam shuts the car bonnet which reveals several creatures standing behind him
Something comes through the keyhole that Adam is looking through and pierces his eye
Adam looks through a crack in the door and sees one of the creatures
A hand breaks through the attic floor
Claire looks up and sees a creature at the window
One of the creatures squeals at Claire
Finn’s face suddenly turns demonic
Adam bangs loudly on the door behind Claire
Adam suddenly grabs Claire’s ankle
Cora screams at Adam
A creature stands up behind Adam and impales him through the stomach
During  mid-credits scene, we see the logging truck drive off while calming music plays only to reveal the creature screeching at the camera
As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out
When Thomas turns around, two people in cape stand behind him
A loud gunshot
Beth wakes up to a loud noise
A screaming woman runs by in the distance
A woman suddenly appears and runs by Beth
Claire’s foot falls through the wooden floor
The bathroom door slams shut
A bathroom door is suddenly pushed open
Accompanied by a sound effect, the group see a mangled animal corpse in the trees
Luke stands outside the cabin for a few seconds after he hears noises from the woods. Hutch then appears behind him and calls out “Luke” which may startle some viewers
Phil approaches the upstairs door but before he can enter Dom makes a loud noise by breaking a chair
During Luke’s dream there is a sharp high pitched noise
The liquor shelf suddenly falls away and Luke wakes up
Luke sees some slight movement behind the trees and a sound effect plays (although nothing particularly scary occurs on screen)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Luke sees some fluorescent lights flicker
Luke sees the neighboring tent flung into the air
Luke calls out to Phil and immediately after Phil is taken by the beast
Accompanied by a sound effect, Luke sees Dom hiding behind a tree trunk
The beast breaks through the trees in front of Luke and Dom
A door loudly bursts open
Dom looks back at his wife who has now transformed into the beast
One of the corpses suddenly moves slightly (this is accompanied by a sharp sound effect)
Luke gets to his feet and attempts to hobble away but the beast jumps down beside him
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
A snake snaps at Darius as he reaches into the hole
Darius is grabbed from above
Two masked members appear in the shadows
Jen is grabbed by Darius
Jen is rushed by Edith
Jen is attacked
A cult member charges out of the cave
An axe lands between Jen and Scott
